full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BUM GTER GYI CHO GA DGE LEGS CHAR 'BEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES CHO GA RNAMS CHAD LHAG MED CING MOS PA DRAG PO BRJOD DE, KHANG GZHI BDAG KHYAD PAR CAN GNAS PA'I RI SOGS SU SA 'DOM GANG LHAG TZAM BRKOS PA'I GZHUG ,GNAMS SNANG BRGYAD DAG PA GSER GYI MDO THIG SNGON PO BRGYAN PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA RNAMS 'DON GZHAN YANG BSANGS, BRGYA RTZA KLU GTOR SOGS GANG RGYAS GTONG ZHING, MJUG TU BKRA SHIS KYIS BRGYAN PAR BYA'O, ,BUM GTER BZHUG PA'I TSUL 'DI NI DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS MIG CHA'I DGONGS PA DANG MTHUN PAR, BTZUN PA'I GZUGS CAN SNYOMS @005B LAS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS RGYA MTSO ZHES BGYI BAS, GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAMS PA 'KHYER BDER BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS SO,, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BKRA SHIS, ,)
